channel.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - vSphere maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 1, 09:00 - 11:00 UTC

May 30, 22:22 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 01/08/2025 09:00 UTC
End time : 01/08/2025 11:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for vSphere offer.

Thank you for your understanding

item.title: [SBG2A][Managed vSphere] - Equipment update notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 21, 11:30 - 21:00 UTC

Jun 24, 20:28 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed vSphere offer.

Start time : 21/07/2025 11:30 UTC
End time : 21/07/2025 21:00 UTC
Service impact : During the operation, customers may experience a few seconds of slowness when reading from or writing to their datastore.
However, there will be no impact on the vSphere UI, data availability or virtual machines.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an update for multiple storage servers.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [ERI1C][Hosted Private Cloud] - Migration Zpool
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 7, 07:00 UTC  -  Jul 11, 16:00 UTC

Apr 10, 21:51 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 07/07/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 11/07/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : You may experience a micro cut if the customer is writing a lot on the zpool.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our teams will perform filer transfers.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - vSphere maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 2, 07:00 UTC  -  Jul 4, 16:00 UTC

Jun 12, 22:47 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.
This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 02/07/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 04/07/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : vSphere not accesible for 1h and hosts will be put in maintenance mode during the maintenance and a vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for vSphere offer.
An individual communication will be done to inform customers and you can reschedule through the manager.

Thank you for your understanding

item.title: [RBX8][VMware Private Cloud] - Racks R807R16/17/18
item.description:
Jun 20, 23:33 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on VMware Private Cloud offer, in the specific racks R807R16/17/18 has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 20/06/2025 22:08 UTC
End time : 20/06/2025 23:30 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a network equipment issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Jun 20, 22:56 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our VMware Private Cloud offer, in the specific racks R807R16/17/18, RBX8 region.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 20/06/2025 22:08 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some softwares are unreachable
Customers Impact : Some Customers cannot access their project.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a network equipment issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jun 20, 22:52 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an event affecting our VMware Private Cloud offer, in the specific racks R807R16/17/18.
Start time : 20/06/2025 22:08 UTC

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
